## SSXEnsConfig interface

ENS options supported by SSX.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface SSXEnsConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolve](./ssx.ssxensconfig.resolve.md) |  | [SSXEnsResolveOptions](./ssx.ssxensresolveoptions.md) | ENS resolution options. True means resolve all. |
|  [resolveOnServer?](./ssx.ssxensconfig.resolveonserver.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Enable the ENS resolution on server instead of on client. |
